AcceptUserAgreement.name: AcceptUserAgreement
AcceptUserAgreement.description: Grants permission to accept the Amazon Braket user agreement

AccessBraketFeature.name: AccessBraketFeature
AccessBraketFeature.description: Grants permission to check if an Amazon Braket feature is enabled for an account. Customers need this permission to use all features available in the console

CancelJob.name: CancelJob
CancelJob.description: Grants permission to cancel a job

CancelQuantumTask.name: CancelQuantumTask
CancelQuantumTask.description: Grants permission to cancel a quantum task

CreateJob.name: CreateJob
CreateJob.description: Grants permission to create a job

CreateQuantumTask.name: CreateQuantumTask
CreateQuantumTask.description: Grants permission to create a quantum task

GetDevice.name: GetDevice
GetDevice.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the devices available in Amazon Braket

GetQuantumTask.name: GetQuantumTask
GetQuantumTask.description: Grants permission to retrieve quantum tasks

GetServiceLinkedRoleStatus.name: GetServiceLinkedRoleStatus
GetServiceLinkedRoleStatus.description: Grants permission to check if the Amazon Braket service linked role has been created

GetUserAgreementStatus.name: GetUserAgreementStatus
GetUserAgreementStatus.description: Grants permission to check if the account has accepted the Amazon Braket user agreement

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to listing the tags that have been applied to the quantum task resource or the job

SearchDevices.name: SearchDevices
SearchDevices.description: Grants permission to search for devices available in Amazon Braket

SearchJobs.name: SearchJobs
SearchJobs.description: Grants permission to search for jobs

SearchQuantumTasks.name: SearchQuantumTasks
SearchQuantumTasks.description: Grants permission to search for quantum tasks

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to a quantum task or a hybrid job

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from a quantum task resource or a job. A tag consists of a key-value pair
